summary:
Joan\'s modeling portfolio.
Contains 12 images of my character Joan.
descriptionHtml:
Notice: I will add more images as time goes on, those of modeling I was asked to do, and those I take myself on personal time.

Notice: I have uploaded 2 new images on this mod page of joan\'s new look, I recently got back to skyrim and did some updating and changes, I feel that her new look is more realistic looking, and in my opinion better looking.
Changes were mostly in the face, but one change was made to her body shape, I widened her hips to give a more appealing curve to them, resulting in a more well rounded appearance.

She is available for modeling work.
If you wish for a custom image to use for your mod, or any other reason, contact me through nexus PM system.

Requirements:
CBBE compatibility, With Bodyslider compatibility IF possible.
Artistic freedom, I may want to do things my way a little.
Not for body/face meshes or textures, or normal maps.
No porn, no sex animations, etc.

Joan\'s modeling portfolio.
Contains 11 images of my character Joan.

I take pride in my work.

I will post more in the future so if you liked these keep an eye out, It will be longer between images as I will have to be prompted by something ingame that makes me think of an image I can make.

Also feel free to comment on all my images, and give advice, or suggest mods that might enhance my images, such as textures or meshes for objects, landscape, or mods that alter lighting, shadows, reflections, etc

(Do not suggest body/face textures or mesh, or any sort of facial reconstruction, Joan is exactly how I want her and I will not change her unless I see a chance, in my mind, to improve her, but that would have to be something that brings even more realism to her, and I will be the judge of that.) 

Mods used:

Superb ENB-RL by sung9533 and Alakan
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11318

Expanded Jewelry Crafting by lautasantenni
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8361

New Severus collection jewelry by Severus616
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24549

Piercings for CBBE by newmiller
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33040

UNP Jewelry Variants 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28780

Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente (Used bodyslider for custome look)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666 

Fitness Body by Svarog
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16731

Mature skin texture and body for UNP and CBBE by Maevan2 (God Bless you!)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32986

Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture - CBBE UNP UNPB ADEC Vanilla by Xs2reality
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28946

BFG - Better FaceGen by Radioragae
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6953

Brows by Hvergelmir
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30411

The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722

Eye colours with new style Eyelashes by Radioragae
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12732

ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

Updates:
0.3: Added 3 Images, Removed 2 images. (10 and 11), This is because I felt they did not have the same quality and Style/Feel as my other images.
0.2: Added 6 more images
0.1:  5 images
author: Lostami
